analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a news article about Steve Bannon's involvement in Michael Moore's documentary 'Fahrenheit 11/9,' including details about Bannon's meeting with Moore and his political strategy commentary about 'head wounds' versus 'pillow fights' in political warfare.
